title: matchmaking algorithim, seems solid.
body:
how the fuck do a b3,b4,unranked,lvl 18,lvl 11 get matched against a platinum5,two silver 5's,a b4 and a lvl 30

how the fuck is this a good fair match up. cant even play normals without tryhards like this getting matched up against not even lvl 30's on my team and just cheesing early on then camping the lower levels( which is pretty obvious by the lack of experience)

seems legit like a good system.

replies.body: I once saw 5 challenger players in a normal when ranked was down vs a bunch of level 7-26's. Challenger team won in like 11 minutes.
yeah, it was Ban Nidalee and who I assume to be their friends ;p
